mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Close-up view of the exterior facade with plaque reading "Cora Carter Seminar"

"Originally three separate buildings with breezeways between, [The Carter, Walbridge and Hawkins Seminar Buildings] were combined into a single administration building..." --http://www.franklloydwrightatfsc.com/FSC-FLW%20Doc%20-%20Early%20Years.htm Currently the L.A. Raulerson building houses "Accounts Payable Office, Administrative Computer Center, Business Affairs, Business Office, Controller, Human Resources Office, Institutional Research Office, Operations Office, Purchasing Office, Student Accounts, Vice President for Finance and Administration, Financial Aid Office." --http://www.flsouthern.edu/map.aspx [work]
